templates.name: What is Vermeil?
templates.content: Vermeil is a term used to describe high-quality jewelry that must meet the following standards; The base metal is .925 sterling silver (no brass, copper, nickel, or tungsten). The gold karat must be at least 12K. We utilize 18K and 14K, depending on the piece. The gold must be at least 2.5 microns thick - this is much thicker than electroplating or typical gold dipped jewelry and will outlast typical gold plated items. All Vermeil items are a 925 sterling silver base, except Franco and Tennis chains which are made of a stainless steel base due to the chain style.

templates.name: Are the Alpaca throws cruelty-free?
templates.content:
Absolutely! No alpacas are harmed in the shearing of their wool, and our throws are completely cruelty-free. The artisan partners we work with in
Peru are a World Fair Trade Organization and they follow strict protocols to make sure each animal is treated with care and consideration. Their entire supply chain adheres to fair trade standards, including the shearing process. We also just want to note that if alpacas are not sheared, there is a much higher chance they will get parasites or catch diseases. Also, since alpacas don't naturally shed their fleece, it's important to shear them so they don't overheat in the summer.

templates.name: What is the remove before flight tag?
templates.content:
In the 1990's, we started adding a small red ribbon to our jackets with the text "Remove Before Flight". In aviation, Remove Before Flight ribbons have been used for decades as safety warnings to indicate that a device, such as a protective cover or a pin to prevent the movement of mechanical parts, is only used when the aircraft is on the ground. These ribbons serve as a reminder to pilots to remove specific parts or components before take off. 

These warnings are of extreme importance; in some cases, non-removal of a labeled part has caused airplane crashes. As our iconic flight jackets became popular with our civilian customers, the "Remove Before Flight" ribbon was implemented as a way to pay homage to our aviation roots.

templates.name: Bubbles in Finish Gel
templates.content: If you are experiencing bubbles in your Finish Gel, you may have to "re-set" your brush for this bottle. Sometimes air bubbles get trapped in the bristles of the brush and end up in the liquid which causes your finished manicure to look like that. The best way to fix this is to take your brush out of the bottle of Finish Gel and wipe your brush in all directions on a piece of paper towel. I would recommend doing this 2-3 times. After doing that, your Finish Gel should no longer have a bubbly appearance.

templates.name: Why do you choose to use palm oil derived ingredients in some of your products?
templates.content: Although using other types of vegetable oils seems like a practical solution to avoid using palm, it can potentially create similar, if not even larger, environmental and social problems. They typically require more pesticides, fertilizers, and land than palm oil. Our goal is to source only certified RSPO (Roundtable on Sustainable Palm Oil) and derivatives. We work closely with our vendors to ensure RSPO standards are met and maintained. The RSPO, its suppliers, and our vendors are audited by third-party auditing agencies to be held to the specific criteria that the RSPO and its members espouse to. If a supplier is not currently using RSPO Certified palm oil we will do our best to choose alternative ingredients or ensure they are working towards only sourcing sustainably sourced palm oil in the near future.

templates.name: How do I care/wash my items?
templates.content:
We recommend all clothing items (shirts, pants, rompers, etc) to be hand washed or washed on a delicate cycle in one of our garment bags for added protection, with mild detergent. Items containing embellishments that are delicate in nature (pom pom & lace trims, etc) should be laid flat to dry. Please note that any items made of mostly delicate components, specifically lace dresses and rompers, should be hand washed.

Use iron as needed to remove wrinkles and smooth out satin bows for a crisp clean finish. The only case in which an iron is not advised is on t-shirts or capes with a satin vinyl embellishment as it may come off onto the iron. Glitter embellishments may be ironed directly.

templates.name: Why canâ€™t I buy this menâ€™s shoe in a womanâ€™s size?
templates.content: Most of our men's shoes use Italian production lasts, which tend to be wider in the footbed and heel than a woman's last. We try our best to provide men's styles in a M7/W9 as that tends to be the bottom range of men's production lasts. Occasionally we will bring a men's style into women's sizes, but that involves a new last and complete reconstruction of the shoe, which ultimately gets redesigned and looks quite different as the end result.

templates.name: What makes the Siena mattress different?
templates.content:
The whole reason that Siena exists is to give you the comfort and support of a top mattress, but at a price that's much more affordable. We've focused on delivering a great night's sleep, so you wake up feeling great - with no compromise on quality.

The Siena is also backed by a generous 180-night home trial, a rock solid 10-year warranty, and great customer support. The same can't be said for most of the cheaper mattresses you'll find for below $500 online, which often have questionable quality and customer support.

templates.name: How safe is your non stick coating?/ What is the non toxic coating made of?
templates.content:
Our ceramic non-stick is made from inorganic natural ingredients which are all 100% safe to use in contact with all foods (and FDA approved). Plus, the absence of potentially dangerous chemicals like PTFE, PFOA, PFAS, Lead, and Cadmium means that there's no chance of harmful materials leaching into your food, even if you accidentally scratch or overheat your pan.

The key compound that makes up our non-toxic, non-stick coating is silicone oxide! It keeps your cookware silky smooth and is free of any PFAS, PFOAS, PTFEs and other harmful chemicals. To read more, visit our website and click the tab titled "Our Materials." Happy cooking!

templates.name: Whatâ€™s the difference between FIONx and FREEx?

templates.name: Is it great for plantar fasciitis?
templates.content: If you suffer from plantar fasciitis, here's what you need to look for in your footwear - arch and heel support, cushioning in the midfoot, rigidity in the sole, and firm heel counter. All of the above will prevent impact on the heel and works well in controlling pain that arises due to plantar fasciitis. Our shoes provide support in many cases for users with plantar fasciitis, however, if you have a very high arch, you'll need to switch our insole for one that supports your arch shape.

templates.name: Can the Baobab Water-Soluble Protein Extract be used in hair oils with an emulsifier?
templates.content:
Baobab Protein can be used in hair oils with an emulsifier. However, this will make the product take on a fluid cream texture. But with puresilk natural emulsifier, you'll be able to create a very fluid, luxurious cream that's up to 70% in oils.

However, for best results, we suggest sucraclear oil gellant used at 5-15%, as it should be able to thicken the oils to the point where adding up to 5% baobab soluble protein would yield a stable, fluid oil gel.

And for any other products, just make sure to add 1-2% emulsitec plant derived preservative if adding any water-based materials to oils.

templates.name: Tax Exemption With Prescription Information
templates.content:
Orders for adaptive clothing with prescriptions are tax-exempt! You just need to give us a copy of your prescription, and you can save the tax on your order. When placing your first order, tell us you have a prescription in the comments section. Once you have completed your order, do one of the following:

- Fax your prescription form and order confirmation number to us at 905-738-6236
- Scan your prescription form and email it to customercare@silverts.com with your order confirmation number.

templates.name: What is the difference between first and second quality?
templates.content: The nature of our handblown glass and pottery is such that each individually made item will have its own character and will contain minor imperfections and variations from piece to piece. Second-quality items simply meet a slightly more relaxed standard but are equally as durable as our first-quality items. Second-quality glass and second-quality pottery are available in our Quechee, Windsor and Mountain Lake Park factory stores. Please note that all seconds purchases are final sale.

In addition, the 30-day Satisfaction Guarantee is only eligible for first-time orders. templates.name: How do I dispose of the DoggieLawn?
templates.content:

Many of our customers roll up their used grass and place it in the box the new grass comes in and then throw it directly in the trash. Every lawn comes
with a pair of disposable gloves for you to wear when you change out the grass, so it makes it an easy clean up! If you find any smell starting to come from your grass, you can use any enzymatic spray to neutralize the smell. templates.name: Does tea raise your blood pressure?
templates.content: No, it's usually the opposite! The polyphenols found in teas are generally responsible for helping to lower blood pressure. One study helps explain the confusion, where some increase in blood pressure may occur, but only temporarily and generally due to the caffeine. Long term, the studies show marked improvement in both systolic and diastolic blood pressure readings. Check it out here: https://academic.oup.com/jn/article/133/9/2883/4688119?login=false As always, though, consult with a health care provider for all medical results and treatments.

templates.name: What if my products arrived warm?

templates.name: How do I find public charging stations for my EV?
templates.content:
There are now over 60,000 charging stations with over 160,000 individual charging outlets across the United States - and that number is growing every day. Finding public charging stations is easy. On the road, the best way is to use your vehicle's built-in navigation system, which will help you locate chargers compatible with your car - and can usually provide information on the speed of the charger and whether it's currently occupied. The GreenCars charging station map is another useful resource.

You can also use the charging station tool here: https://www.greencars.com/resources/find-ev-charging-stations to look up chargers anywhere in the country. Our tool lets you filter by charging speed to help you find the fastest charge possible. The PlugShare and ChargeHub apps are also useful resources for EV drivers on the go.

templates.name: How to install the side charger for AR-15?
templates.content: It's possible to adapt the AR-15 rifle skin for an upper with a side charging handle. You can either puzzle together the pieces on the flat surface, or measure and cut your own single piece from the sheet section of the template and trim it to fit.

templates.name: Which should I get auto focus or manual focus?
templates.content: This is a matter of personal preference. Focusing a laser isn't challenging, but it can be intimidating. If you feel intimidated by the idea of focusing a laser, get the auto focus; however, take the time to learn how to focus your machine manually once you've gotten the hang of the machine. Just like photography there are many techniques that can be employed by knowing how to manually adjust the focus.

templates.name: How to pair caviar
templates.content:
Caviar is a delicious addition to many meals and recipes. The most common accouterments include creme fresh, lemon wedges, hard-boiled eggs, or minced onions. A traditional serving may include blini, a small buckwheat pancake.

It is also popularly served with champagne, and if you select champagne, we recommend a "brut" or "extra brut" but not an "extra-dry" to get the best possible flavor pairing.

I'd recommend taking a look at our Blog where you can find recepies and pairing suggestions: https://imperiacaviar.com/blogs/blog

templates.name: My succulents are becoming limp/wrinkly/crispy
templates.content:
As succulents grow or adjust to new conditions, their older, lower leaves become dry and crispy and will eventually fall off. This is a natural growth process and you can remove dry lower leaves by hand without harming the plant.

If, however, you notice top or center leaves becoming limp, wrinkled, and dry, the leaves are likely wilting from too little water. Fortunately, succulents are very drought tolerant and will quickly recover if you water deeply during a cool part of the day, protect them from direct sun, particularly when temperatures exceed 80F and if you remove the leaves that are already dry and crispy.

templates.name: Where do I find my cameraâ€™s IMEI/MEID?
templates.content:
Your camera's IMEI/MEID number is on a sticker inside the camera. However, there may be times you need to check whether it's stored properly in your camera's memory. There are a couple of situations in which you may not see the IMEI/MEID number when you view the Information for your camera. If you just reset your camera to the default settings, the IMEI/MEID number will disappear. Turn the camera off and back on, then view Information again. 

If your GoCam is brand new and you have just put it in Setup mode, you may need to change the Send Mode to Instant and let the camera search for and log in to the network before you can see the IMEI/MEID number.

templates.name: Ottoman Connector at angle
templates.content: First just to double check, do you have the ottoman connector on the correct leg? It should be on the ottoman leg that doesn't line up with the sofa arm.  Once the ottoman connector is tightened onto the top of the ottoman leg, you then bring the ottoman to the sofa at an angle (the part of the ottoman facing a bit downwards) so that when you straighten it out, the "hook" part of the connector latches onto the front rail of the sofa. You need to really reach under to connect and squeeze the ottoman and sofa rail very closely. Unfortunately I understand connecting it is a little difficult since the connector was made to be pretty tight. It's supposed to fit quite exactly to make sure that the connector stays on tight.  We also recently added a drawing to our instruction manual that might help: https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0089/4487/7630/files/Sabai_InstructionManual_Ottoman_Connector-9-9-21.pdf?v=1631211833 If coming at an angle doesn't work we can send a new one, although it would be the same as the one you have. We're also having our designer look into this issue and he is currently in the process of making revisions/redesigning our ottoman connector. When we have this new revision we'd be happy to send it! Just please follow up with us in a month to see what the status is.

templates.name: What is the shelf life of Bissinger's confections?
templates.content:
Good question! Many of the recipes used to craft our confections were created in a time when refrigeration was scarce. Therefore, they needed to be able to last, while still retaining their high-quality taste. Because we still use many of those original recipes today, our products have retained their long shelf life, lasting approximately 6-9 months without the assistance of additives or preservatives.

Hope this helps and let me know if you have any other questions!

templates.name: Why do you sell 3 different styles of rotary axises? Which is right for my application?

The 3-jaw chuck rotary can accommodate the smallest diameter objects such as pens, chopsticks, darts, etc. Finally, the 4 wheel style rotary is the most versatile right out of the box. templates.name: Can I take the capsule on the plane?

templates.name: Serving size - Mindbodyskin
templates.content: The serving size is 3 capsules with a meal (it works better with food as it has digestive enzyme and Vitamin A is fat-soluble). templates.name: Can I take your blends while fasting? Which, if any, will break a fast?
templates.content: It depends on the strictness of your fasting protocol. If you're allowing bone broth, amino acids, or stevia - which are low calorie but can impact blood sugar levels slightly - then all of our blends (besides Complete Protein) would also be allowed. If your fasting protocol only permits water, unsweetened tea, black coffee, and apple cider vinegar, then we recommend saving our blends until after your fast. In fact, plenty of folks choose to break their fast with an adaptogen blend to balance cortisol levels and deliver a quick burst of nutrients while keeping blood sugar low.

templates.name: How Can I Clean My Sandals?
templates.content: We recommend using an antimicrobial soap and warm water and hand washing your sandals thoroughly. Please, do not machine wash them. To remove dirt, or any other build-up from the grooves in the top soles or out soles, try using a soft-bristled brush, such as a dish brush or old toothbrush, to gently scrub away any debris. You can carefully bend the shoes to open up the grooves and allow for water to clean deeper.

templates.name: Low light plant recommendations
templates.content:
All succulents need light to survive, but some varieties can handle indoor lower-light environments better than others. You can see our Indoor Succulents category here: http://mountaincrestgardens.com/house-indoor-succulents/ Haworthia tend to be the most tolerant of low light: https://mountaincrestgardens.com/haworthia/

Keep in mind these plants will still want about 6 hours of indirect sunlight or a grow light to thrive, but they can survive lower light environments for multiple weeks. Be extra careful not to overwater when keeping plants in low light.

templates.name: Will your rings turn my finger green?
templates.content: All of our jewelry is made of 925 sterling silver and plated in real rhodium or gold. While 925 sterling silver is less likely to turn your finger green compared to other lower-quality silver alloys, it is still possible. The green discoloration is usually caused by a reaction between the copper content in the sterling silver and the natural oils on your skin, which can be influenced by factors such as your diet, medications, and the acidity of your skin. However, with proper care and maintenance, you can minimize the likelihood of experiencing this discoloration.

templates.name: Is the Raedia waterproof?
templates.content: It isn't! This device is water-resistant but not water-proof which means that it can withstand light sprays and water droplets on its surface, but you don't want to ever hold it directly under the running water or submerge it in a filled tub at all. When using it, always ensure that the battery compartment is sealed tightly to keep any precipitation from entering, store the device on a ledge or shelf out of the shower head's range, and take out the batteries after each use to dry it out and leave the device open to dry. Also, please don't use different types or brands of batteries together and don't use a fresh battery with an old one.

templates.name: How much do I feed my fish?
templates.content: You should not feed your fish more than they can consume in five minutes. During the summer months fish food should be high in proteins. In the spring and late fall it is best to feed them wheat germ or other low protein food because it is easily digested.

templates.name: How do I store sake?
templates.content: To preserve the quality, we recommend that nama, ginjo, and daiginjo are refrigerated upon receipt. We don't have expiration dates listed on the bottles (the date marked on the bottle is its bottling date), but most can maintain its quality and flavor in the refrigerator for up to one year. Generally, junmai and honjozo can hold at room temperature for several months. However, it's still best to keep everything refrigerated, as well as after opening to maintain the quality and taste for 3-7 days. You can read more about storing our products in our Guide here: https://www.tippsysake.com/pages/sake-guide-how-to-store-sake

templates.name: My product was recalled what do I do?
templates.content:
At Belkin, customer safety and satisfaction are always our top priorities. While our products undergo rigorous testing and quality checks, on rare occasions, an issue may arise. When that happens, we take immediate action to investigate, communicate clearly, and resolve the matter as quickly as possible.

If your product is part of a recall, we will provide clear instructions on how to properly recycle or dispose of the product and receive a full refund. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience and cooperation throughout the process.

templates.name: Why does your advertising say â€œeach pieceâ€ for mattress pricing?
templates.content:
Our mattresses and box springs can be bought individually or sold in sets. Mattress and box spring sets include a discount when purchased together.

Each mattress and box spring is considered one piece each. This means that a twin, full, and Queen mattress would come with two pieces: the mattress as one piece, and the box spring as the second piece. Our King mattress sets have three pieces: a mattress and a split box spring, which includes two pieces.

templates.name: How often should I wash my wig?
templates.content:
We recommend that you wash your wig only when it's dirty. It isn't necessary to wash your wig if you're looking for a style change. It may just need to be styled. 

On average it is recommended to wash your wig every 4-5 weeks if worn daily. Only you can determine when the wig is dirty and not looking its best. We also recommend that you avoid heavy styling products that leave residue in the hair so you can prolong the length of time between washings.

templates.name: What's the difference between the Brush-on Shield Glow and Bronze and the Face Shield Glow and Bronze?
templates.content: Face Shields Glow and Bronze SPF 50 are liquid formulations. These offer more intense radiance without the shimmer and leave skin with a dewy finish. The Brush-on Shields SPF 50 in Glow and Bronze are powder formulations that offer a convenient, on-the-go application of both SPF and the radiance. templates.name: When will I see results from taking Tongkat Ali?
templates.content: Although individual results may vary, some men feel significant improvements after taking their first dose of Tongkat Ali. Others need a few weeks. Taking Tongkat Ali consistently for one full month gives you roughly 50-60% of the herb's benefits. Two months of regular supplementation bring you closer to the 70% mark. That's another reason why we offer all our customers an extended money-back window. If over the first few months on Tongkat Ali you feel that it's working for you, we recommend taking it for 3-4 consecutive months to get the most out of its benefits for your physiology.

templates.name: How do I make my magnetic eyelashes stick to the magnetic liner better?
templates.content: Apply an even coat of eyeliner, the same thickness as the magnets and make sure it's 80% dried before magnetizing lashes for optimal hold! templates.name: How do I set the Litter-Robot 3 timer (Wait Time Setting)?
templates.content: Press and hold the Empty button on the Litter-Robot control panel for 3 seconds to enter Wait Time Setting mode. One of the lights will start flashing, indicating the current Wait Time Setting. Use the Reset button to toggle to the next setting: blue for 3 minutes, yellow for 7 minutes, and red for 15 minutes. Press and hold the Empty button to save the setting. The blue light will blink to confirm, then return to standby.

templates.name: Does your mattresses contain any harmful chemicals, glues, formaldehydes or fiber glass?
templates.content:
There is no fiberglass in our mattresses, one of the many reasons why we stand out! All mattresses are required by the federal government to use a type of FR (Fire Retardant Barrier). To ensure we follow this requirement, but also to ensure a healthy environmentally friendly product we use a hydrated silica fiber sock around our mattress as our FR material. This material does not contain fiberglass and is non-toxic with no sprays. One other thing to note is that hydrated silica is the same thing that is used in toothpaste and is not harmful.
 
Our foam is also certified safe! CertiPUR-US is a "certified non-toxic foam," a petrochemical polyurethane foam that has been tested and certified by an independent lab to meet specific standards for physical performance, indoor air emissions, and environmental stewardship. The foam is made without ozone depleters, PBDEs, mercury, lead, and formaldehyde. This certification means it is safe for you with limited pollutants used during production.

templates.name: My packages was marked delivered but I haven't received it (If it has been more than 7 days since delivery date)
templates.content:
We apologize for the inconvenience of delayed delivery. Once your package leaves our facility, it is in the hands of the carrier (either USPS or DHL) and we are unfortunately unable to control its course. We would recommend reaching out to the carrier with your tracking number to see if they can give you any further information.

We would also recommend checking with your local post office, neighbors, and your mail delivery person to see if the package has been misplaced.

We do have a Lost Package Policy that may apply to you in the future. If you have still not received your product after 20 days from your initial purchase, or if the order has been marked as delivered for more than 7 days, the order will fall under our Lost Package Policy and we would be happy to replace the items or refund you.

If for some reason it's not delivered or is unable to be located after following our suggestions, please feel free to let us know!

templates.name: What is the best way to care for my Silicone watch straps?
templates.content: Silicone watch straps are sensitive to perspiration, saltwater, and oil, which are easily absorbed and can cause the strap to crack and then break. Periodic cleaning is recommended. Using an old soft toothbrush and a mild dish detergent and water, thoroughly cleanse the inside and outside of the strap. Completely rinse off any soap residue and then thoroughly dry the strap. If you expose your strap to saltwater, be sure to rinse it with clear water as soon as possible. A rubber protectant may also be used to keep the strap pliable and extend its lifespan.

templates.name: What do the numbers and letters mean on the color box?
templates.content: It's how we designate the characteristics of our shades. The number defines the level or depth in the shade (aka the lightness/darkness of a shade) and is designated with 1 being black, and 10 being the lightest blonde. The letters directly following the number identify the tone or tones. The first letter is the dominant tone, and the second letter is the supporting tone. Here's an example: 5GM (Brown, Gold, Mahogany).

templates.name: What is Monk Fruit?
templates.content:
Monk fruit is a small sub-tropical melon that has been cultivated in the remote mountains of Southern China for centuries. According to legend, monk fruit is named after the Buddhist monks who first cultivated the fruit nearly 800 years ago.

Monk fruit juice is an amazing 20 times sweeter than other fruit juices. The unique low-calorie sweetness of monk fruit comes from naturally occurring antioxidants found in the fruit that have a delicious, sweet taste, without the calories of sugar. Used as a food ingredient monk fruit adds delicious low-calorie sweetness, replacing sugar and calories with great-tasting goodness from fruit.

templates.name: Who is the Nolah Natural best for?
templates.content: The Nolah Natural is ideal for side sleepers and back sleepers alike. The Nolah Natural features All Natural Latex, which provides gentle contouring and immediately bounces back into place as you shift positions. Coming in at a 5-6/10 on the firmness scale, this hybrid mattress perfectly balances cushioning with support and pressure relief. Latex is also naturally hypoallergenic, making the Nolah Natural perfect for sleepers with allergies or asthma.

templates.name: Do you have anything that treats UTI's?
templates.content:
We do not have a specific product for UTIs. While Clairvee helps provide relief for vaginal itching and discharge symptoms associated with hormonal fluctuations, it is not intended to treat any infections or diseases. Clairvee has been proven to work effectively alongside antibiotics and antifungals, which treat BV, VVC, and UTIs. However, Clairvee is not meant to replace antibiotics or antifungals.

We would recommend that you reach out to your healthcare professional to determine your options as they know your specific medical history best.

templates.name: What do I do when slime is sticky or melted?
templates.content: It is very easy to care for slime and bring it back to life if it feels sticky or melts over time (all hand-made slime will react this way). Use an activator, which we have in our shop. Mix a little bit at a time into your slime thoroughly and it will revert back to its satisfying state. The stickier it is, the more you may need. Do not dump it all in at once - it may over-activate, which makes the slime hard or stiff.

templates.name: Will Carpe work for hyperhidrosis?
templates.content: While no cure or treatment yet exists for the root cause of hyperhidrosis (which researchers believe originates in the brain), Carpe was specifically made to help manage the sweating caused by hyperhidrosis of the hands and feet, also known as palmar and plantar, or palmoplantar hyperhidrosis. Hyperhidrosis causes moist hands and feet through sweating, and Carpe can be a huge help in reducing this sweating!

Always allow the mat to dry completely before putting it away to prevent any unwanted mold. Make sure to use caution at all times on the mats, as we cannot be held responsible for damage done after the mat has been used.

templates.name: Does the Ristela Mixes provide the same dose ingredients as the Ristela?
templates.content:
Both Ristela and Ristela Mixes feature the same hormone-free, clinically tested formulation and have the same safety and efficacy. However, Ristela Mixes are daily drink mixes taken as one packet a day, mixed into water or another cold beverage, while Ristela is taken as two tablets per day.
 
Ristela Mixes are great for individuals who prefer a non-pill route for their supplements, have trouble swallowing pills, or are already taking lots of pills - but ultimately, it's up to you as to which version of Ristela you'd prefer to take.

templates.name: I'm experiencing itching/burning/discomfort. Which product should I choose?
templates.content: Sorry to hear that! Here are a few questions to help categorize what you're experiencing: Is your vulva and vagina sensitive to the touch? Do you feel pain, burning, itching, or stinging, especially when applying products, wiping, or intimacy? Do you feel dry, but mostly discomfort and sensitivity? Do you feel no dryness, but feel discomfort? Have you tried other products and felt burning and stinging upon application that did not subside after a few minutes? If you answered yes to any of these questions, the V Relief Serum is a great choice for you. The serum features the SensV-3 complex, with a peptide specifically developed for sensitive skin, with discomfort related to itching, burning, stinging, and hypersensitivity. Plus, hyaluronic acid provides hydration, and vitamin E supports skin health.

templates.name: What is the best way to clean my lenses?
templates.content:
For everyday cleaning, wipe your lenses with the microfiber cloth provided by BonLook. For more thorough cleaning, rinse them with gentle soap and water.

We recommend that you avoid using household cleansers (e.g., window cleaner, rubbing alcohol, etc.) on your lenses as they may damage the scratch-resistant coating. Also, it's best to not clean your delicate lenses with coarse materials (e.g., wool, paper towels, bath towels, t-shirts, etc.). Although they may seem soft, they can scratch your lenses. Lastly, do not lay your eye wear lens-down; this is one of the common ways that lenses end up scratched. They should be stowed away in their case whenever you are not wearing them.

templates.name: How long will my baby sleep in the bassinet?

templates.name: How can I keep drain hose from freezing?
templates.content: The Porch Potty Standard can be used in below-freezing temperatures without the drain freezing shut or causing any damage to the Porch Potty. The Porch Potty Premium however, will need to be detached from the garden hose during the extreme cold winter months. This is to prevent the water in the hose and sprinkler head from freezing, expanding, and potentially cracking the sprinkler body. The drain hose will have no problems draining though, so feel free to manually water the grass to rinse the synthetic grass. The water goes down the drain without freezing because it happens too quickly for the water to freeze. You can also bring the potty indoors to wash it out in a bathroom or shower and return it outside when it's dry.

templates.name: How do I wash your products?
templates.content:
Most of our apparel is made from our signature Viscose from Bamboo, and we suggest washing them on cold/gentle cycle inside out. Lay flat to dry for optimal longevity or dry low and cool iron if needed. Please follow all care tag instructions. 

Viscose is know to be buttery soft and the softer the fabric, the more pilling is common - however, laying flat to dry really keeps the fabric new. Most moms prefer to line dry for optimal texture, lasting color, and to last through the life span of the item. Due to the delicate nature of our lush fabrics, please do not wash with other items with zippers, buttons, or hardware.

templates.name: How do IV drips work?
templates.content:
Intravenous (IV) fluid drips deliver saline solution through a small catheter and tubing directly into the bloodstream. This solution usually includes medications and vitamin supplements that are tailored to the individual patient.

During therapy, the nurse inserts an IV line which is attached to a bag of saline solution. The bag is then hung above the patient's head. IV therapy bags are designed to let gravity, as opposed to a syringe or other forced technique, carry fluid into the veins over time.

The duration of a single treatment varies from person to person, but typically lasts 30 - 45 minutes. The exceptions to this timeframe are our NAD IV treatments, which generally last 1 - 2 hours per session.

For apartments and condos with a front desk, your item(s) will be delivered to the front desk area. If the apartment or condo does not have a front desk, the item will be delivered right outside the front entrance.

The delivery will be rescheduled if the delivery team cannot locate a dry and secure area outside your front entrance.

templates.name: What is proposition 65?
templates.content: Proposition 65 requires businesses to provide warnings to Californians about significant exposures to chemicals that cause cancer, birth defects or other reproductive harm.  A warning for acrylamide on a food product suggests that regular consumption of the food over time can pose a greater cancer risk than consumption of foods with lower acrylamide levels.

Most of our shavers can be used to shave wet or dry, with or without shaving cream or foam. Pitbull, Butterfly Kiss, and Palm shavers are also IPX5 water resistant, so you can safely shave in the shower. However, please do not fully submerge any of our shavers.

If you are using original Skull Shaver from 2013-2014, then you can only do dry shave. This was our first model and it comes with the engraved name as Skull Shavertm on the shaver handle/body.

templates.name: What are 7/8 leggings?

Longer than capris but shorter than full-length leggings, our 7/8 styles are the perfect in-between look, designed to sit just above your ankles. If you need a shorter length of a certain style, you can purchase the 7/8 length in that style. It is the same length as our short inseam leggings! If a certain style of legging is not available in 7/8 length, a short inseam will still be offered.

templates.name: Why do you use fiberglass in certain Casper mattresses?
templates.content:
All mattresses sold in the United States are required to meet stringent fire ignition resistance standards to protect consumers against the risk of dangerous fire incidents. To meet these standards, certain models of Casper mattresses contain a knit fire sock comprised in part of materials containing continuous filament (single-strand) fiberglass.  These fire socks create a fire barrier to protect consumers and are designed to minimize fraying or release of particles under normal use conditions.

The Casper One, Dream, Dream Max, Snow, Snow Max, and Casper Select Cooling Mattresses are all fiberglass-free.

templates.name: How do I wash my swimsuit?
templates.content:
Please wash your suit as soon as possible after each wear. Even if you don't go in the water, sand, sunscreen and your body's natural oils can still impact the life of your swimsuit. Always hand wash your suit! Our favorite bikini-washing formula is combining cold water with just a touch of gentle laundry detergent. Let it soak for 5-10 minutes then rinse it out gently and lay flat to dry. Even on white swimwear, stay away from bleach. For spot cleaning, a little bit of Shout will do the trick. 

If you're drying your swimsuits outside, hang or lay them in the shade. Drying in the sun too long can cause discoloring and fading. Never iron or throw your suits in the dryer. Too much heat can cause fading as well or terrible damage to the fabric.

templates.name: Will the Nira Pro Laser give me better results?
templates.content:
The NIRA Pro uses the same patented, non-fractional laser technology as the NIRA Precision. Both lasers have the same wavelength, which is 1450nm (+/-20 nm), and a maximum power of 2 W. The main difference is that the NIRA Pro features our largest treatment head (10x the area of the NIRA Precision Laser) and can treat wrinkles on the full face, neck, chest, and hands. Meanwhile, the NIRA Precision Laser is perfect for targeting small, hard-to-treat areas such as crow's feet.

For maximum facial renewal, we recommend combining NIRA Precision with NIRA Pro to treat both small and large surface areas.

templates.name: What is the difference between CBD hemp extract and hemp oil?
templates.content: CBD hemp extract is the same ingredient as full spectrum hemp extract, however it is different from hemp seed oil. Hemp seed oil is made by pressing dehulled hemp seeds. Full spectrum hemp or CBD hemp extract can be derived from other parts of the hemp plant (flower, leaves, stalk, etc.), which contain higher amounts of the phytocannabinoids compared to just dehulled hemp seeds.

templates.name: How do I soften the ice cream when it's too frozen?
templates.content: The best thing to do, if you want to maximize the flavor of your ice cream, is to let the ice cream soften a bit or temper. As it warms up - just a bit - the flavor of the ice cream will notably increase, resulting in maximum enjoyment for you and your guests (that is, if you're kind enough to share). We recommend you let your ice cream sit out on the counter if only for a few minutes. Your taste buds will love you!

templates.name: System: Difference Between Pivot and Timeless
templates.content:
The main difference between the Pivot and our Timeless Coravin models is the longevity of the wine's preservation.  With the Pivot, since you remove and replace the cork, you can only preserve and save your wine for up to 4 weeks.  However since you remove the cork to use it, the Pivot also works on synthetic and composite corks bottles. Perfect for casual consumption. 
 
Our Timeless systems allow the preservation of bottles of wine for much longer. You can pour your favorite still wines without pulling the cork. You just need to place the Timeless System on top of the bottle and push the needle through the cork. Bottles sealed Natural Cork will last the natural shelf life of that Wine, up to months and years later. Hope this helps!

templates.name: I have sensitive skin. Can I wear your jewelry?
templates.content: Yes, 99.9 % of people can wear every single item we make with no risk of irritation. We adhere to strict metal quality standards and we don't use nickel as a base metal, nor do we plate with nickel silver. Our 14k gold fill and sterling silver metals do not contain nickel. Our electroplated chains are also free of nickel, down to the core. All ear wires are completely free of nickel and are, in most cases, a great fit for sensitive ears.

templates.name: Are your ear wires nickel free?
templates.content: Yes, every single ear wire and post in our line is free of nickel. Our earrings can be worn by almost everyone without a risk of irritation (including our founder Katy who has a nickel allergy).

templates.name: What do you recommend for irritated ears?
templates.content: We recommend ear care gel or Benadryl cooling spray. These help calm irritated skin.

templates.name: What happens if your jewelry irritates my skin?
templates.content: If a piece of our jewelry irritates your skin, we will do everything to replace the chain or components, redesign the piece with a different material that will be a better fit for you, or offer you money back if you'd rather find another jewelry solution elsewhere! We aren't miracle workers but we do try to pull one off every now and then.

templates.name: Sometimes my skin turns red and itchy when I wear jewelry. Can I wear Grayling?
templates.content: Our lead designer, Katy, is allergic to several metals including nickel. She created Grayling for people with sensitive skin like hers. None of our metal finishes contain nickel, lead, or harmful chemicals! All alloys are tested and are guaranteed to be 100% nickel free or your money back.

templates.name: My skin turns black or green with jewelry sometimes. What's up with that?
templates.content: What you're referring to is often called "staining". Good news, staining isn't caused by allergies, it's actually a reaction between the metals used in jewelry and our skin. When jewelry touches areas that perspire, the PH in our skin can react to the metal it touches, and then, our skin can turn black or green. Our jewelry doesn't have nickel and is hypoallergenic, but sometimes the copper can cause the skin to temporarily discolor.

templates.name: How can I keep my skin from turning black or green?
templates.content: Experiment with wearing jewelry for shorter periods of time, for instance, make it the last thing you put on before you leave your house and the first thing you take off. You can also try coating earring backs or the insides of rings with a light layer of clear nail polish. Try and clean your jewelry with liquid soap and water and dry well between wears, and don't wear your jewelry while exercising.

templates.name: Where are your items sourced?
templates.content: We source as much of our materials as possible from domestic suppliers who care about the environment and the people who work for them.  The materials in our fine collection are environmentally responsible and include recycled metals from a third-party verified U.S.-based refinery. Our 14k gold fill and sterling silver chains are machine-made to order in New York and Italy and we work with U.S. suppliers whenever possible to assure fair wages and safe working conditions. Our exclusive partnerships with several family-owned chain makers and plating houses within the US assures you a high-quality, unique product, while simultaneously investing in the economy.

templates.name: What base metals do you use?
templates.content: Two different base metals are used in our jewelry, brass and aluminum.

templates.name: How long will the metal finish last?
templates.content: Our finishes are thicker than industry standard and very durable, however, they are susceptible to wear depending on the conditions they are subject to. Some of the worst conditions are presented by lotions, perfumes, and sweat all of which are acidic, and will deteriorate the finish at an accelerated rate. Showering and swimming will also affect how a finish wears.

templates.name: Will my jewelry tarnish?
templates.content: Some finishes will tarnish more easily than others, with the most susceptible being antiqued silver. Protectants are applied to all our finishes to help prevent or slow this process, but tarnishing may still happen depending on what you expose your jewelry to. You can clean tarnish off your jewelry with a soft dry cloth. Minimizing exposure to lotions, perfumes, sweat, and water, as well as cleaning your jewelry after every wear, will help protect the metal finish. Don't sleep or exercise in your new electroplated jewelry.

templates.name: How should I clean my Grayling Jewelry?
templates.content: I recommend you wipe down your jewelry with a cotton cloth after every wear and if they require extra oomph, add an ammonia-free cleaner when wiping it down. Think Windex multi-purpose vinegar solution or simple green can be added on a lint-free or cotton cloth and just wipe down the jewelry from there. Simple vinegar works, as well.

templates.name: What kind of pearls do you use?
templates.content: All pearls used are genuine Swarovski crystal pearls from Austria. They feature a solid core of Swarovski crystal, which is then covered in layers of innovative pearlescent "nacre" to create a flawless surface that resists cosmetics, chemicals, and perfumes. Quality is strictly controlled to ensure each crystal pearl is perfect, resulting in pearl jewelry that's like no other.

templates.name: What is Cradle to Cradle Products Innovation Institute?
templates.content:
The Cradle to Cradle Products Innovation Institute (C2C) â„¢ is a non-profit organization that educates and empowers manufacturers of consumer products to become a positive force for society and the environment, helping to bring about a new industrial revolution. To receive certification, products are assessed for environmental and social performance across five critical sustainability categories: material health, material reuse, renewable energy and carbon management, water stewardship, and social fairness. 

We are proud to say our fragrances are C2C Certified Silverâ„¢, one of the world's most rigorous product sustainability standards.

For more information on C2C, visit https://www.c2ccertified.org/.

templates.name: Why did you increase the price for your subscriptions?

We always strive to deliver incredible value to our customers by keeping our tees as affordable as possible. However, over the last couple years, we have seen significant price increases in our raw materials (such as the cotton that makes your tees so soft) and logistics (the packages that transport those comfy tees to your doorsteps). We will never sacrifice the quality and safety standards of our fabric and manufacturers, which is why we decided to increase prices for our short sleeve subscription packs.

templates.name: Difference between Gut+ and Butyrate
templates.content: Butyrate and Gut+ both contain the POSTbiotic butyrate in slightly different forms (butyrate vs. tributyrin). Gut+ also contains a PREbiotic called PreforPro which is a prebiotic bacteriophage designed to target unwanted bacteria in the gut. This allows your natural probiotics to flourish without taking a PRObiotic supplement that can cause unwanted side effects - or may simply not work at all. A few other key differences separate Gut+ from Butyrate, so we've created this handy chart comparing the two. Please check it out via here: https://bodybio.attn.tv/sl/CAwS0QSa

templates.name: How to turn on/off gaming mode for 5Q, 5QS, and X50Q

templates.name: What is the difference between desktop lasers, mid-range and high power lasers, and fiber markers?
templates.content: Desktop lasers are often used for small-scale operations like arts & crafts and hobbyist projects, whereas mid-range and high power laser engravers are for large-scale ventures performed by various business industries. Both are capable of engraving applications such as wood, glass, leather, and acrylic. The mid-range and high power however have better cutting capabilities. Fiber markers ,on the other hand, are designed for metal materials and hard plastics. Fiber markers are more powerful and engrave quicker than desktop and cabinet lasers by concentrating the laser beam into a thinner point.

templates.name: How do I use my weighted razor?
templates.content:
Gently glide your weighted razor, applying light to no pressure along your skin, 
using slow, short strokes to avoid nicks or cuts. Be sure to rinse or wipe the blade after every few strokes to clear it of hair and shave pillow. Letting the blade get gunky keeps it from making full contact with your skin. Depending on the direction of hair growth, it can be helpful to shave in more than one direction. This is often the case with underarms and bikini area.

templates.name: How do I clean the Porch Potty?
templates.content: To clean the Potty, we recommend using warm water with vinegar or water and bleach. Use these to wipe down the tray and the sides of the Potty. This will help clean any urine that may have missed its mark, as both male and female dogs may pee too close to the side or splash. Make sure to get under the tray too! If it is the grass that is smelling, you can also try soaking it in the solutions above then rinse and dry completely. If soaking in bleach do not go over 5 minutes and make sure the ratio of water is greater than bleach. We also recommend using our very own Turftastic to eliminate all urine odor from the synthetic grass or live grass: https://porchpotty.com/products/turftastic-the-first-odor-eliminator-for-dog-potties?_pos=1&_psq=Turftastic&_ss=e&_v=1.0

templates.name: Care Instructions ( Rigid Denim, Stretch Denim, Corduroy, Rinse Washed Denim)
templates.content:
Wash your jeans inside out in cold water with like colors and add a cup of vinegar to the wash to prevent fading. Although the vinegar may leave a temporary scent, it will disappear with wear..
Use detergents specifically designed for dark colors, such as Woolite or Tide.
When washing a rinse wash or dark indigo jean for the first time, wash it alone to prevent any issues with dye transfer. Also avoid using bleach on your denim.

templates.name: How long is the lifetime of my watch battery?
templates.content:
Battery life varies usually from 2 to 3 years depending on the type of watch, its dimensions, and the amount of energy required by the different functions. For instance, a chronograph will have a higher energy consumption than a watch indicating the hours and minutes only. 

Some Mondaine watches feature a power preserve indicator: once the second-hand starts moving in 4-seconds intervals, it's time to have the battery replaced by a qualified watchmaker.

The adhesive we use has been cleared by the FDA for use as a component of medical devices, so it is one of the safest out there, however, if you're allergic to silicone or get irritations from adhesives such as band-aids, please refrain from using our patches or consult a medical professional beforehand.

templates.name: How much oil should I give my dog daily?
templates.content:
Depending on your dog's weight we recommended the following daily quantities: 

0-15 lbs = 1/2 pump (1ml)
15-25 lbs = 1 pump (2ml)
25-50 lbs = 2 pumps (4ml)
50-75 lbs = 3 pumps (6ml)
75+ lbs = 4 pumps (8ml)

Pump the oil directly onto your dog's food and mix it well. Please check each bottle for any differing recommendations depending on size or function.

templates.name: How do I prevent warping Carbon Steel?
templates.content:
Carbon steel can warp if heated or cooled too quickly which happens most frequently on glass stovetops and induction ranges or by running a hot pan under the faucet. This is a result of the exceptional conductivity of carbon steel as a metal.

Tips to introduce heat to your carbon steel pan:

â€¢ Heat your pan with low-medium heat
â€¢ Introduce a fat, oil or protein and then add heat gradually
â€¢ Never leave your pan exposed to heat for extended periods of time and never when empty
â€¢ Use a burner that is sized appropriately to the pan and will heat the surface evenly

templates.name: What is matcha?
templates.content: Matcha is made from ground up green tea (tencha) leaves. This creates a super fine powder. It gets its bright green color because the tea plants are temporarily grown in the shade. This tricks the plants into overproducing chlorophyll because they think they aren't getting enough sunlight. To learn more about Matcha, we highly recommend reading our comprehensive guide here: https://fullleafteacompany.com/pages/matcha-facts

templates.name: What is raw organic blue agave and where does it come from?
templates.content: Not all agave is equal in quality. The agave plant is mainly grown in the deserts of Mexico. Raw agave is minimally processed in temperatures that can be found in the climates where the agave is grown, between 115-120 degrees Fahrenheit. Other agave may be processed at a higher temperature and some agave may even be mixed with cheaper additives including high-fructose corn syrup. All the agave used in our products is of the highest quality and is certified raw and organic by the largest agave supplier in the world.

templates.name: How can I sharpen my knife?
templates.content:
With a long, tubular shape and blunt tip, a honing steel-also called sharpening steel or honing rod-is designed to realign the edge of your knife's blade with just a few strokes.

How is this process different from sharpening? The difference is, quite literally, microscopic: as you use your knife, the sharpened part of the blade-i.e. the edge-develops tiny (as in, too small to see with the naked eye) dents, dings, and other defects. With sharpening, you're literally creating a new edge by shaving away incredibly thin layers of metal; with honing, you're simply pushing the existing edge back into alignment, which can make your blade feel temporarily sharper. You can read more on the differences between honing and sharpening in our guide: https://madeincookware.com/blogs/honing-vs-sharpening

templates.name: How does Soltera differ from the Level?
templates.content:
Although both Soltera and Level are excellent choices for commuters, there are slight variances that will ultimately depend on what you're looking for in an ebike. 

The Soltera comes in both a single-speed version and a seven-speed. Soltera can reach a top speed of 20 MPH on both pedal assist and throttle and has a more aggressive riding stance, so you'll be leaning slightly more forward as opposed to being positioned upright. It also comes in more color variances if you'd like something more vibrant or subtle!

The Level is our classic commuter bike. Though it's heavier than Soltera, it is designed to let you ride faster. If a higher top speed is of utmost importance to you, the Level can reach top speeds of 28 MPH on pedal assist. A rear rack and fenders are also included with the Level in the event you'll be needing these accessories!

templates.name: Why is lateral training considered superior to treadmills, bikes or ellipticals? / What makes your products better?
templates.content: There are 3 planes of human motion. Traditional cardio trainers like bikes, steppers, treadmills and ellipticals, move the body in one plane of motion only, and as a consequence, they focus their work on the fronts and backs of the lower body only. Our lateral trainers work the body in all 3 planes of human motion. This means that more muscles are being worked during every moment of a workout, translating to increased calorie burn and quicker achievement of targeted heart rates.

templates.name: How do I use a hair mask?
templates.content: You will get the best results from your hair mask if you use it after cleansing with our signature shampoo. On wet clean hair, step away from direct water pressure from the shower and ring out excess water. Then apply the desired amount of your hair mask and apply on mid-strands through your ends. Allow it to sit on your hair 5+ minutes before rinsing with cool temperature water.

templates.name: What does Dive Mode do?
templates.content:
We've been reported that the buttons on the Lume Cube compress at depths around 60ft. When this happens, the buttons can perform a hard reset on the Lume Cube, shutting the Cube off. Dive Mode disables the use of buttons which eliminates the possibility of a hard reset being performed on the Lume Cube underwater.

Because it disables the buttons, you will have to preselect your brightness setting prior to activating the Dive Mode. If you have Lume-X, Dive Mode can be accessed through Mission Control. If not, you can manually turn on Dive Mode: with the Lume Cube facing away from you, hold down both buttons until the red charging light blinks. To disable Dive Mode, tap the combination LEFT RIGHT LEFT RIGHT and try cycling through brightness levels by tapping the left button. This can take a few tries to get the timing right.

This mode has been added fairly recently and has not been added to the guides as we have such a small percentage of customers that use these lights for diving below 60ft.

templates.name: Tips for setting up the GoCam in the field
templates.content:
To position and test your camera in the field, start with the following settings:

- Normal (640 x 480) resolution thumbnails (reduces send time)
- Trigger interval 0 seconds (reduces time between photos)
- Real time On (reduces send time and time between photos, allows you to change settings once you're done positioning and testing your camera)

Once you have walk-tested your camera and have it aimed the way you want it, change the thumbnail size and trigger interval if desired, then turn real time Off. Don't forget to update settings once you've made the changes!

We have some customers who use multiple products together and some who use just one product. templates.name: Will Nutrafol work for my hair type?

In a recent clinical study, we examined the effectiveness of Nutrafol in African American, Asian, Hispanic, and non-Hispanic men and women. templates.name: Difference between parfum, EDP, EDT, and cologne
templates.content: Parfum has the highest concentration of juice, causing the scent to be released over a longer period of time in a series of notes. The second-highest concentration is found in Eau de Parfum which has a touch lighter smell to it than perfume. Then, the Eau de Toilette has a lighter scent than Eau de Parfum, so I recommend that you apply it liberally. Lastly, Eau de Cologne is the most subtle version of fragrance. If it helps further, Eau de Toilette and Eau de Cologne are generally interchangeable, particularly in Men's fragrances.

templates.name: Does ModCloth have sustainable / sustainability initiatives?
templates.content: We're made up of a compassionate group of people dedicated to having a net-positive effect on the world. With the utmost respect for internationally recognized human rights and environmental standards, we're committed to conducting business in a lawful and ethical manner. Additionally, we expect our manufacturing and market vendors, who are considered business partners, to share this same commitment. In order for partners to do business with us, they must conduct business in compliance with applicable laws, including labor laws, and environmental laws and policies. We audit our partners for compliance, and in the event we discover a partner isn't following these guidelines, we work with them to develop an action plan to improve, before we terminate business with them. By working on an action plan, we help the business improve, rather than just cutting them loose and having them continue their poor practices with other business partners that might not care. All that being said, there's always room for improvement! We're always looking to add more sustainable practices and items to our collections. You can read more at https://modcloth.attn.tv/sl/k3w_p_aV or you can reach out to support@modcloth.com if you need more info.

templates.name: How can I remove stains from the bag?
templates.content: We recommend putting it in a mesh laundry bag to protect the hardware and then washing in cold water on a gentle cycle. Let it air dry for up to a couple days. You can put rolled up terry cloth towels in the pockets to help absorb the moisture from the corners and speed drying. When washing a changing pad you'll need to ensure that all the water is removed before air drying. We suggest putting the washed changing pad on a dry towel and rolling it up tightly to squeeze out the excess water (repeat until all water is removed). We also recommend spot treatment before washing as that'll help loosen up the stains before a regular wash, sometimes even soaking the bag over night in one of these treatments. We've heard things on Motsenbocker Lift Off, Magic Eraser, Boogie Wipes, Shout Wipes, or a paste of Oxy Clean, Dawn dish soap, baking soda works great depending on what the marks are.

templates.name: Does Made In Enameled Cast Iron Need Seasoning?
templates.content: You do not need to season your Dutch Oven or Skillet as the enamel coating is naturally resistant to sticking. However, the top rim of the pan is unfinished cast iron, so we would advise keeping that oiled with neutral oil on a semi-regular basis. To maintain this, take a paper towel and lightly dampen it with canola oil, vegetable oil, or Made In seasoning wax and rub the rim gently. Then, take a dry paper towel and rub away excess. This is great to do whenever you notice the rim getting dry or every 1-2 months.

templates.name: How do mice leave?/How does the pouches work on mice?
templates.content: Mice often enter and exit homes rather than just staying in one place the entire time. Our pouches will make the area in which they are placed less appealing to mice and they will be triggered to leave. Mice can crawl through a hole the size of a dime, so nearly all homes have areas we can't see where mice enter and exit. You can buy your pouches here: https://www.grandpagus.com/pages/mouse-repellent-pouches

templates.name: What are spider gears and what do they do?
templates.content: Spider gears are also known as satellite gears, they rotate around the side gears in the differential carrier. Side gears may also be referred to as axle gears or planetary gears. The spider gears are the ones with the cross-pin shaft going through them. This array of spider and side gears take the rotational energy from the driveshaft and help redirect it outwards to the axles and on to the wheels. They also play a key role in allowing the wheels to rotate at different speeds when the vehicle is turning.

templates.name: My 5Q function key has strange lighting
templates.content:
If your function key on the 5Q keyboard is strangely lit, it's possible that the keyboard is in testing mode from our manufacturing facility. You can test this by pressing CTRL + FN. If the Function key turns white then please do the following steps to exit testing mode. 

- Press CTRL + FN (key will light white)
- Press FN (key will blink white)
- Press L-CTRL + L-ALT + PRT SC (repeat this step twice)

Once you've done this, the FN key should have normal illumination. Let me know how that goes!

templates.name: What's the difference between classic and resort?
templates.content:
There are two main differences between our classic bamboo sheets and our resort bamboo sheets - the weave type and the thread count.

Our classic sheets have a twill weave; one up stitch one down stitch weave. The resort sheets have a three up stitch one down stitch weave, because of the minimal variance in the thread, this gives the resort sheets a smoother effect. 

Bamboo thread count is very different than a regular cotton thread count so we try our best to compare them. Our classic sheets have a thread count of 240, which is comparable to a 1,000 thread count. The Resort sheets have a thread count of 400, which is comparable to a 1,500 thread count making them that much softer!

templates.name: What is Tens therapy?
templates.content:
TENS machines are a safe, powerful alternative to harsh drugs or invasive treatments. Our TENS machines help people experience clinically-tested pain relief from the comfort of their homes. They work by sending electrical impulses to the sensory nerves that block pain signals from reaching the brain. This provides natural analgesia in the body without the need to ingest medication or undergo manual manipulation or surgery.

TENS therapy machines can help relieve pain associated with chronic and acute conditions such as headaches, migraines, neck pain, shoulder pain, back pain, sciatica, leg pain, lower limb pain, foot and ankle pain, poor circulation, fibromyalgia, joint pain, carpal tunnel syndrome, sciatica, athletic or exercise injuries and more.

templates.name: How does Thermella compare to other available solutions?
templates.content: Thermella is the first non-prescription treatment that reduces hot flashes and night sweats at the source by blocking NKB, a peptide in the body's thermoregulatory center that causes hot flashes and night sweats. Thermella is supported by clinical data from randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled studies and works in as early as just two weeks, faster than most other non-prescription, plant-based options that can take months to work. Thermella is also non-hormonal. This means that, unlike phytoestrogens such as soy, black cohosh, red clover, evening primrose oil, etc., Thermella does not have a similar structure to estrogen and does not act like estrogen in the body or impact estrogen levels.

templates.name: Is Thermella safe for cancer patients or survivors?
templates.content: Thermella is non-hormonal and does not act like estrogen in the body. However, Thermella has not been studied in the cancer population. Individuals with cancer or cancer survivors should speak to their healthcare provider before taking Thermella.

templates.name: What is the stem length?
templates.content:
Stem length varies depending on flower type and variety. For instance, ranunculus are small and delicate flowers with shorter stems, while lilies have thick stems and can be much taller. On average stem length will be about 18-19 inches. Roses will typically fall right in this range, but again, this depends on the rose variety and bloom size.

The flower stems will often be slightly different lengths when they arrive. We do this to keep the buds from smashing into each other during shipping. When the Bouq arrives we recommend you cut all the stems to the same length and proper height for the vase for the most attractive arrangement!

templates.name: Can I grow hardy succulents indoors?
templates.content: It is certainly possible to grow hardy succulents indoors, however, they typically aren't happy about it. They tend to not develop their brightest colors indoors. They also are more susceptible to rot when grown indoors. Although we don't recommend growing hardy succulents indoors, there are a couple of tips that will help you be more successful with it. Be extra careful not to overwater them and use a very gritty soil like Bonsai Jack soil. Give plenty of light, either with an unobstructed south facing window or a grow light and ventilate the air around it using a fan.

templates.name: Will the stove damage the grass?
templates.content:
Using the fire pit with the Stand lifts the fire pit 2.75" off the ground and the Stand minimizes heat transfer to the surface below. If the fire pit has been left for an extended amount of time with the grass not being exposed to sunlight, it will cause the grass to die/discolor in that area. We recommend using a Stand when placing your fire pit on grass to provide enough space around the fire pit's lower vent holes and to protect the health of your lawn.

If your grass is tall and/or thick, it is possible your grass will still die even if using the Stand with your Solo Stove.

templates.name: Are your products certified organic?
templates.content:
Although we use many Organic ingredients in our lattes, the product is not certified Organic because we do include some non-Organic ingredients.

The reasons for this are either that we haven't been able to find an Organic source for this ingredient, or that, in the case of our turmeric for example, we're sourcing from a small family farm for whom Organic certification is expensive and not yet feasible. In this case, the turmeric is grown pesticide-free and using 'organic' practices, but isn't technically certified because of the cost. If you'd like to check if a specific ingredient is Organic or not, please look on the ingredient list on our website. Anything that is certified Organic will be named as such.

templates.name: How can I dispose of the insulated box?
templates.content:
Our eco-friendly packaging is not just recyclable, it's compostable and biodegradable. The Green Cell Foam insulation is made with 100% all-natural, non-GMO corn grown in the U.S. Cut open the outer plastic film and add to your #4 PE recyclables. Dissolve small pieces of foam in the sink and watch it "melt" safely down the drain; it will biodegrade in seawater and freshwater. Larger pieces can go in a bucket and sit overnight to fully dissolve. 

Green Cell Foam is compostable in any residential or commercial compost facility and will biodegrade in 60 days or less when in a moist soil environment. Green Cell Foam burns cleanly and safely in fireplaces, fire pits, and power plants- it can even work to start a grill.

templates.name: Gas leaking from device
templates.content:
I'm sorry to hear that you're having this issue with your Coravin. We'll help you get this sorted. In 90% of cases similar to yours, the gas is either leaking or being wasted from one of several known places. The First could be that the capsule cup itself is leaking. We recommend cleaning the threads inside the capsule cup and where it attaches, as sticky residue can build up there, preventing a thorough seal. This can be done with a hot, wet cloth (preferably lint-free, like a bar towel). You also can use a toothbrush and hot water. Allow the threads to dry before reattaching.

The Second main thing to check on is the gas used per pour, as it's possible that excess gas is escaping after the pour. When pouring your glass of wine, please make sure to only press the trigger lightly 2-3 times to get the flow going. At the end of your pour, when you straighten your Coravin upright, if you hear a long hiss of gas escaping this is indicative of having used too much Argon.  

Other tips to help, please do not unscrew the device to check on the capsule as this will waste all remaining Argon.  Also please remove the cork at the end of the bottle and simply pour wine as regular. Please let me know if any of these tips help solve your issue! If not we would be happy to continue troubleshooting what is wrong with your device, and even replace it if need be. We would also be happy to send you some extra capsules to replace those you lost to this issue.

templates.name: What formats can you digitize?
templates.content: We can digitize videotapes (VHS, VHS-C, S-VHS, S-VHS-C, Betamax, Hi8, Digital8, Video8, MiniDV, HD MiniDV, and MicroMV). We can convert most PAL and SECAM consumer format tapes, but the only foreign format we can't convert are PAL and SECAM Betamax tapes. We can also digitize film (8mm, Super8, 16mm, and Super16). Since sound on film is so rare, and to ensure we're providing the highest quality transfers, it's not our standard process to digitize film with sound. We digitize photos (35mm Slides, 126 Slides, Photo Prints (up to 8.5 x 11"), and 35mm Negatives) - when sending them, we ask that you remove them from any extraneous container, group them in bundles of 25 and place them in clear plastic ziplock bags or envelopes. As for audio, we digitize standard Audio Cassette Tapes, Mini Cassettes, Micro Cassettes, and 1/4" Reel-to-Reel Audio.

templates.name: Is the precision a better option than pro?
templates.content:
The effectiveness of laser treatments can vary depending on an individual's face shape and specific concerns. While both the NIRA Pro and NIRA Precision laser devices are FDA-cleared for facial wrinkle reduction around the eyes and are proven safe for use on all skin areas on all skin types and tones, the practical application may differ.

The NIRA Pro laser may be more challenging to use effectively on small and curved areas like facial wrinkles because it requires the laser to be flush with the skin to activate properly. Due to the limitations of the Pro device in treating such intricate areas, the Precision laser might be a more suitable option.

The NIRA Precision laser, designed for smaller and more delicate treatment areas, could be easier to maneuver and apply accurately on areas like the nasolabial folds, marionette lines, corners of the mouth, lipstick lines, and laugh lines. Its design allows for precise targeting, which is particularly important when dealing with sensitive or detailed regions.

templates.name: An item I purchased is now on sale, can I receive a price adjustment?
templates.content:
We would be happy to price adjust your order if it meets the following criteria:

- Order was shipped within 7 days of the sale start date
- The item(s) must be in stock and identical in color and size
- No Rhone Rewards were used on the order

If your order was shipped within 8-45 days of the sale start date and meets the other criteria listed above we can issue you store credit for the price difference.
